Module com.example.paint1
Package com.example.paint1

Class MenuFeatures

java.lang.Object
com.example.paint1.MenuFeatures
public class MenuFeatures extends Object
This class file is used to manage the menu bar and all the relevant menu bar events.

    • open

      public void open(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, javafx.stage.FileChooser fileChooser)
      Opens and loads an image file into the Canvas of the application using a FileChooser. Updates the application title with the name of the opened file, sets the Canvas dimensions based on the image size, and draws the image onto the Canvas. Updates the initial directory of the FileChooser to the last opened location and keeps track of opened files in a HashMap associating tab indices with opened files.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - primaryStage of the application
      fileChooser - used the select image files for opening

    • save

      public void save()
      save any modifications made on the canvas

    • saveAs

      public void saveAs()
      save as, specifically pick why type of file to save the canvas as or change file types with a warning about potential data loss

    • newProject

      public void newProject(javafx.scene.control.TabPane tabPane, List<ShapeMath> listCanvas)
      Creates and adds a new project tab to the specified TabPane and associates a new ShapeMath instance with the tab, adding it to the provided list of ShapeMath objects
      Parameters:
      tabPane - where the new project tab will be added
      listCanvas - list of ShapeMath object where the new ShapeMath instance will be added
